SEARCH
Package mathexp

Class Expression

java.lang.Object
mathexp.Expression
Direct Known Subclasses:
Add, Div, Mul, Number, Sub, Variable
public abstract sealed class Expression extends Object permits Add, Div, Mul, Sub, Variable, Number
Abstract class representing a mathematical expression. Specific arithmetic operations and types of expressions must extend this class.

    • eval

      public int eval(String varAssignment)
      Evaluates the expression based on a string containing variable assignments.
      Parameters:
      varAssignment - a string in the format "x=5;y=10", where variables are assigned values.
      Returns:
      the result of evaluating the expression with the provided variable values.
